description: An extractor allows to create a reusable extractor for providers.

ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.
ID.title: ID

SSEManagement.description: This property defines how you want the extractor to work with server-side events. With Collect all the events buffer until the server closes the connection and sends the entire data to the lua code while Stream will collect line by line and will send events line by line.
SSEManagement.title: SSEManagement

analyzers.description: The analyzers parameter allows for customizing which analyzers should be used, overriding the default selection. Each analyzer entry can optionally include a prefix to modify its behavior:    - No prefix: Runs only the specified analyzers and any dependencies required for deeper analyzis (slower but more acurate).   - '+' (enable): Activates an analyzer that is disabled by default.   - '-' (disable): Disables an analyzer that is enabled by default.   - '@' (direct execution): Runs the analyzer immediately, bypassing the deeper analyzis (faster but less acurate).  An analyzers entry can be specified using:   - The analyzer name (e.g., 'Toxicity detector')   - The analyzer ID (e.g., 'en-text-toxicity-detector')   - The analyzer group (e.g., 'Detectors')   - A detector name (e.g., 'toxic')   - A detector label (e.g., 'insult')   - A detector group (e.g., 'Malcontents')  If left empty, all default analyzers will be executed.
analyzers.title: analyzers

anonymization.description: How to anonymize the data. If deanonymize is true, then VariablSize is required.
anonymization.title: anonymization

behavior.description: Defines how to handle error in the case of a webpage. If set to Popup, the error will be shown in a popup. If throw, a javascript error will be returned.
behavior.title: behavior

block.description: Block the request to the provider if not Allow. If Before, the data will be blocked before running any extraction or analyzis. If After block the request after analysizis.
block.title: block

cancelBehavior.description: The behavior to take when cancel is chosen from the popup.
cancelBehavior.title: cancelBehavior

deanonymize.description: If true, deanonymize the redacted data. This has no effects on streaming output.
deanonymize.title: deanonymize

honorPriorDecision.description: If true, it will wait on a prior popup and honor its decision. It only has effect if there is an existing popup being shown.
honorPriorDecision.title: honorPriorDecision

ignore.description: If true, the analysis will run, but nothing will be logged.
ignore.title: ignore

importHash.description: The hash of the structure used to compare with new import version.
importHash.title: importHash

importLabel.description: The user-defined import label that allows the system to group resources from the same import operation.
importLabel.title: importLabel

libs.description: References existing extractorlibs by name to make them importable in the extractor script.
libs.title: libs

name.description: The internal reference name of the object.
name.title: name

path.description: A regular expression to match a URL path to log.
path.title: path

propagate.description: Propagates the object to all child namespaces. This is always true.
propagate.title: propagate

script.description: If not empty, use this lua code to run the extraction.
script.title: script

skipAnalysis.description: If true, the content will be logged with no analysis taken and content sent back as-is.
skipAnalysis.title: skipAnalysis

updateTime.description: Last update date of the object.
updateTime.title: updateTime

title: Extractor
